auth_login_subtitle: Sign in to manage your containers
auth_no_login_methods_description: There are currently no login methods enabled. Please contact an administrator.
auth_processing_login_description: Please wait while we complete your authentication.
auth_oidc_invalid_response: There was an issue with the OIDC login response. Please try again.
auth_oidc_misconfigured: OIDC is not configured correctly on the server. Please contact an administrator.
auth_oidc_userinfo_failed: Could not retrieve your user information from the OIDC provider.
auth_oidc_missing_sub: Your OIDC provider did not return a subject identifier.
auth_oidc_email_collision: An account with your email already exists but is linked to a different OIDC identity. Please contact an administrator.
auth_oidc_token_error: There was an error obtaining tokens from the OIDC provider.
auth_user_processing_failed: An error occurred while processing your user account.
auth_unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
auth_oidc_access_denied: Access was denied. You may have cancelled the login or lack permission.

auth_oidc_state_mismatch: Security validation failed. Please try logging in again.
auth_oidc_session_expired: Authentication session expired. Please try again.
auth_oidc_user_info_missing: Authentication succeeded but user information is missing.
auth_oidc_callback_error: An error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
auth_oidc_network_error: Network error during authentication. Please check your connection and try again.
auth_oidc_url_generation_failed: Unable to generate authentication URL. Please try again or contact your administrator.
auth_oidc_init_failed: Failed to initiate OIDC login. Please try again.
auth_oidc_redirecting_description: Please wait while we redirect you to your identity provider.

volumes_no_containers_using: No containers are currently using this volume.
volumes_labels_description: User-defined metadata attached to this volume
volumes_no_labels_or_options: This volume has no additional labels or driver options.
volumes_remove_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to remove volume {name}?
volumes_remove_selected_message: Are you sure you want to remove the selected volume(s)? This action cannot be undone.
volumes_browser_delete_confirm: Är du säker på att du vill radera {name}?
volumes_backup_restore_confirm: Är du säker på att du vill återställa denna säkerhetskopia? Detta kommer att skriva över nuvarande volyminnehåll!
volumes_backup_delete_confirm: Är du säker på att du vill ta bort denna säkerhetskopia?
volumes_backup_restore_message:
Detta kommer att ersätta ALLA data i volymen "{volumeName}" med innehållet i denna säkerhetskopia.

En säkerhetskopia kommer att skapas automatiskt innan du återställer, så att du kan ångra den här åtgärden om det behövs.
volumes_backup_restore_in_use_warning: ⚠️ Varning: Denna volym används för närvarande av {count} behållare. Återställa medan behållare körs kan orsaka datakorruption. Stoppa behållarna först eller använda "Återställ filer" för att återställa specifika filer.
volumes_backup_restore_success: Volymen återställdes framgångsrikt. En säkerhetskopia skapades innan den återställdes.
volumes_backup_restore_files_success: {count} fil(er) återställdes framgångsrikt. En säkerhetskopia skapades innan den återställdes.
volumes_backup_safety_info: En säkerhetskopia kommer att skapas automatiskt innan du återställer, så att du kan ångra den här åtgärden om det behövs.
volumes_backup_overwrite_warning: Valda filer kommer att skriva över befintliga filer vid dessa sökvägar.
volumes_backup_file_restore_success: Filen återställdes framgångsrikt. En säkerhetskopia skapades innan den återställdes.
volumes_symlink_external_tooltip: Denna symboliska länk pekar på en plats utanför volymen

compose_no_services_found: No services found for this project
compose_name_change_not_allowed: Project name cannot be changed while running. Please stop the project first.
environments_subtitle: Manage and monitor your Arcane environments
environments_remove_selected_message: Are you sure you want to remove the selected environment(s)? This action cannot be undone.
environments_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete environment {name}?
environments_api_url_help: The base URL for the environment's API
environments_warning_disabled: This environment is disabled. You can edit its configuration, but you won't be able to access its resources until it's re-enabled.
environments_warning_offline: This environment is offline or unreachable. You can still edit its configuration and test the connection to diagnose the issue.
environments_warning_no_settings: Unable to load settings for this environment. It may be offline, disabled, or have an invalid URL. You can still edit basic environment details.
environments_local_setting_disabled: This setting cannot be changed for the local environment
environments_health_check_description: Automatic monitoring of environment connectivity and status
environments_health_check_interval_descr: How often to check environment connectivity (in minutes). Default: 2 minutes.
environments_cannot_switch_disabled: Cannot switch to a disabled environment
environments_agent_config_description: Regenerate API key and deployment configuration for this agent
environments_api_key_save_warning: Save this API key - it won't be shown again. Update your agent with the new key.
environments_regenerate_warning_message: Regenerating the API key will invalidate the current key. The agent will need to be updated with the new key to reconnect.
environments_regenerate_dialog_message: This will create a new API key for this environment. The current API key will be invalidated immediately, and the agent will lose connection until you update it with the new key.
users_create_description: Add a new user to your system with the required permissions
users_password_leave_empty: Leave empty to keep current password
users_password_description_oidc: Password is managed by your OIDC provider
users_password_description_edit: Leave empty to keep current password
users_display_name_description: Optional display name for the user
users_administrator_description: Grant administrator privileges to this user
events_subtitle: Monitor events that have taken place in Arcane.
settings_subtitle: Configure and customize your Arcane experience
settings_no_results_description: Try adjusting your search terms or browse categories above.
general_projects_directory_help: Katalog där Docker Compose filer lagras (detta är inne i behållaren). MÅSTE vara en absolut sökväg!
general_base_url_help: The Base URL for your docker host. Used when opening containers from the service links
general_user_avatars_description: Control Gravatar usage for profile images.
security_subtitle: Aggregerad sårbarhet fynd över alla bilder i denna miljö.
security_description: Configure authentication methods, session timeouts, and other security-related options.
security_local_auth_description: Username and password stored by Arcane. Keep enabled as a fallback.
security_oidc_client_secret_help: Leave blank to keep the existing secret
security_oidc_merge_accounts_description: Allow OIDC logins to merge with existing local accounts by matching email addresses
security_oidc_merge_accounts_alert_descr: When enabled, users signing in with OIDC will automatically link to any existing local account with the same email address. This allows users to log in with either method. Existing accounts will gain OIDC access without creating duplicates. Warning: Admin permissions will be overwritten based on OIDC claims during login - local admins may lose privileges if OIDC doesn't grant admin, or regular users may gain admin from OIDC claims.
security_session_timeout_description: Inactive sessions will be logged out automatically (15–1440 minutes).
security_password_policy_standard_toolti: 10+ chars with upper, lower, and a number.
security_password_policy_strong_tooltip: 12+ chars with upper, lower, number, and symbol.
security_trivy_image_description: Behållare bild som används för sårbarhet skanningar.
security_trivy_image_note: Obs: Detta måste vara en trivsam bild (till exempel ghcr.io/aquasecurity/trivy:latest).
security_enable_one_provider: Enable at least one authentication provider.
security_enable_one_provider_error: At least one authentication provider must be enabled.
security_form_validation_error: Please check the form for errors.
security_oidc_required_fields: Client ID and Issuer URL are required to enable OIDC.
security_local_enabled_info: Local Authentication enabled to ensure at least one provider is active.
security_auto_login_enabled_description: Auto-inloggning är för närvarande aktiverat via miljövariabler. Autentiseringsinställningar är inaktiverade eftersom användare är automatiskt inloggade med förkonfigurerade inloggningsuppgifter. För att ändra autentiseringsinställningar, inaktivera automatisk inloggning i din serverkonfiguration.
security_scan_all_success: Startad skanning av {count} bilder. Resultaten kommer att visas när skanningar slutförs.
security_scan_all_failed: Det gick inte att starta sökningen efter {count} bilder
security_scan_all_error: Fel vid skanning av alla åtgärder
jobs_description: Configure how often Arcane background jobs run. Changes apply immediately.
jobs_moved_description: Jobbscheman hanteras nu per miljö. Välj en miljö för att redigera scheman och köra jobb.
jobs_environment_scope_description: Dessa scheman och kontroller gäller endast för den valda miljön.
jobs_event_cleanup_description: How often Arcane deletes events older than 36 hours
jobs_analytics_description: Only runs in production, and only if analytics are enabled
jobs_schedule_update_failed: Det gick inte att uppdatera jobbschemat
jobs_run_failed: Det gick inte att starta jobbet
jobs_environment_health_description: Kontrollerar hälsa och konnektivitet för alla aktiverade miljöer
jobs_event_cleanup_name_description: Tar bort gamla systemhändelser för att upprätthålla databasens prestanda
jobs_auto_update_description: Uppdaterar automatiskt behållare när nya bilder finns tillgängliga
jobs_scheduled_prune_description: Tar bort oanvända behållare, bilder, volymer och nätverk
jobs_filesystem_watcher_description: Övervakar projektkatalogen för ändringar och synkroniserar automatiskt
jobs_cron_expression_help: Ange ett giltigt cron-uttryck (sekunder minuter timmar dag månad vardag)
jobs_cron_invalid: Cron uttryck måste ha 6 delar (sekunder minuter timmar dag månad vardag)
jobs_schedule_update_unavailable: Schemalägg uppdateringar är inte tillgängliga för detta jobb
docker_default_shell_description: The default shell to use when opening a terminal in a container
docker_shell_custom_path_help: Enter the full path to the shell executable
docker_prune_all_description: Remove all images not referenced by containers and include named, unused volumes during System Prune.
docker_prune_dangling_description: Remove only dangling (untagged) images and anonymous volumes during System Prune.
docker_prune_mode_description: Choose how unused images and volumes should be pruned.
docker_max_upload_size_description: Maximum size in megabytes for image archive uploads (50-5000 MB)
docker_enable_polling_description: Periodically check registries for newer image versions
docker_polling_interval_description: How often to check for new images (5-10080 minutes)
docker_auto_update_description: Automatically update containers when newer images are found
docker_auto_update_interval_description: How often to perform automatic updates (5-1440 minutes)
docker_auto_inject_env_description: Automatically inject project .env variables into all containers
docker_rate_limit_warning_description: Polling intervals below 30 minutes may trigger registry rate limits. Prefer longer intervals in production.
appearance_description: Customize the look and feel of Arcane
navigation_mode_description: Choose between floating navigation that overlays content or docked navigation that takes up screen space
navigation_show_labels_description: Display text labels below navigation icons for better clarity and accessibility
navigation_sidebar_hover_expansion_descr: When enabled, hovering over the collapsed sidebar will temporarily expand it to show full labels. When disabled, tooltips will appear instead for a cleaner, fixed-width navigation.
navigation_keyboard_shortcuts_descriptio: Aktivera kortkommandon för snabbnavigering (t.ex., Mod+1 för kontrollpanel). När den är inaktiverad kommer även kortkommandon att döljas från verktygstips.
disk_usage_settings_description: Configure which directory to monitor for disk usage metrics.
disk_usage_save_failed: Failed to update disk usage path
timeouts_settings_description: Konfigurera åtgärdstimeouts för långsamma nätverk eller maskinvara. Alla värden är på några sekunder.
docker_api_timeout_description: Timeout för Docker-listans operationer i sekunder (standard: 30)
docker_image_pull_timeout_description: Timeout för Docker-avbildningar i sekunder (standard: 600 = 10 minuter)
git_operation_timeout_description: Timeout för Git-kloning/hämta operationer i sekunder (standard: 300 = 5 minuter)
registry_timeout_description: Timeout för behållarregistret operationer i sekunder (standard: 30)
proxy_request_timeout_description: Timeout för proxierade förfrågningar i sekunder (standard: 60)
customize_subtitle: Customize templates, registries, and configuration defaults
customize_try_adjusting: Try adjusting your search terms or browse categories above.
templates_subtitle: Manage compose registries, templates, and defaults
templates_registries_section_description: Connect to remote sources for community and custom templates
templates_alert_remote_registries_descri: Add remote template registries to access community templates. Registries should provide a JSON manifest with template definitions and download URLs.
templates_community_registry_description: Get started quickly with our community registry containing popular templates:
templates_add_registry_description: Add a remote template registry to access community templates.
templates_registry_url_description: URL to the registry JSON manifest
templates_enable_registry_description: Enable this registry to fetch templates
templates_registry_invalid_format: Invalid registry format: missing required fields (name, templates)
templates_choose_description: Browse templates from your registries or local downloads. Scroll to see more, select to use immediately, or download for offline use.
templates_group_by_registry_description: Enable Collapsible Sections for each registry
templates_defaults_description: Customize the default Docker Compose and environment templates used when creating new projects. These templates will be pre-populated in the new project form.
templates_validation_error: Please fix validation errors before saving
registries_subtitle: Configure access credentials for private Docker registries and container repositories
registries_remove_selected_message: Are you sure you want to remove the selected registry(ies)? This action cannot be undone.
registries_info_description: Common registry URLs and authentication requirements
registries_auth_notes_bullet_docker_hub: Docker Hub requires credentials for private repositories
registries_auth_notes_bullet_github: GitHub uses personal access tokens as passwords
registries_auth_notes_bullet_anonymous: Some registries support anonymous access for public images
registries_auth_notes_bullet_encrypted: Credentials are encrypted and stored securely
registries_add_description: Enter the details for the new container registry.
registries_edit_description: Update the details for this container registry.
registries_url_description: Leave empty or use 'docker.io' for Docker Hub
registries_token_keep_placeholder: Leave empty to keep current token
registries_token_description: Use a Personal Access Token or your password if the registry supports it.
git_subtitle: Hantera Git-förråd och automatisk synkronisering till projekt
git_repository_remove_message: Är du säker på att du vill ta bort denna utvecklingskatalog? Detta kommer också att ta bort alla tillhörande synkroniseringskonfigurationer.
git_repository_ssh_key_placeholder: Klistra in din privata SSH-nyckel här
git_repository_ssh_host_key_verification: Hur du verifierar SSH-serverns värdnyckel. Ange SSH_KNOWN_HOSTS env för att anpassa filen known_hosts sökvägen.
git_repository_ssh_host_key_accept_new_d: Godkänn automatiskt och spara nya värdnycklar till known_hosts
git_sync_remove_message: Är du säker på att du vill ta bort denna synkroniseringskonfiguration?
git_sync_import_description: Klistra in din JSON konfiguration nedan eller ladda upp en .json fil.
git_sync_import_missing_fields: Punkt på index {index} saknar obligatoriska fält (syncName, gitRepo, branch, dockerComposePath)
git_sync_import_failed_count: Det gick inte att importera synkar. {count} fel.
git_sync_browse_files_description: Välj en komponera fil från arkivet
git_sync_browse_hint: Endast YAML/YML filer kan väljas som komponera filer. Klicka på mappar för att navigera.
git_sync_branch_manual_hint: Ange affärsenhetens namn manuellt eller välj ett utvecklingskatalog för att ladda affärsenheter
git_managed_readonly_alert: Detta projekt hanteras av Git. Komponentfilen och projektnamnet kan inte redigeras här. Ändringar måste göras i det anslutna Git-förrådet.
git_managed_env_note: Miljöfilen (.env) kan fortfarande redigeras i Arcane för att ge körtidskonfiguration.
git_environment_card_description: Konfigurera Git-synkronisering för att automatiskt distribuera Docker Compose projekt från Git-förråd till denna miljö.
variables_subtitle: Manage global environment variables that are available to all projects
variables_about_description: These variables are stored in .env.global at the root of your projects directory and are available to all Docker Compose projects.
variables_no_variables_description: Click "Add" to create your first variable
variables_duplicate_keys_error: Duplicate keys found. Please ensure all keys are unique.
variables_save_failed: Failed to save. Please try again.

log_stream_failed_connect: Failed to connect to {type} log stream
log_stream_no_project_selected: No project selected. Please select a project to view logs.
log_stream_no_container_selected: No container selected. Please select a container to view logs.
log_viewer_no_logs_available: No logs available. Start streaming to see logs.
docker_info_dialog_description: Detailed information about your container installation
image_update_click_to_check: Click to check for updates from registry.
image_update_unable_check_tags: Unable to check updates for images without proper tags.
oidc_client_secret_placeholder: Provided by your OIDC Provider (leave blank to keep existing)
oidc_issuer_url_description: The issuer URL will be used to auto-discover OIDC endpoints.
oidc_admin_role_mapping_description: Map an OIDC claim to grant the admin role. Examples: roles=admin, groups=admin, or admin=true.
oidc_skip_tls_verify_description: Disable TLS certificate verification for OIDC endpoints. Proceed with CAUTION.
oidc_auto_redirect_description: Omdirigera automatiskt till OIDC-leverantör på inloggningssidan när den är aktiverad.

oidc_provider_logo_url_description: Anpassad logotyp bild URL för att ersätta standard OIDC ikonen på inloggningsknappen
prune_confirm_description: Select the resources you want to prune. This action permanently removes unused data and cannot be undone.
prune_volumes_guidance: Only enable this if you are certain no important data resides in unused volumes.
prune_volumes_warning_description: Pruning volumes permanently deletes data. Ensure you have backups if necessary.

network_labels_description: Enter additional labels as key=value pairs, one per line

file_drop_zone_drag_drop: Drag 'n' drop files here, or click to select files
polling_hourly_description: Check for new images every 60 minutes
polling_daily_description: Check for new images every 1440 minutes
polling_weekly_description: Check for new images every 10080 minutes
use_custom_polling_value: Use a custom polling value between 5-10080 minutes
ui_config_disabled_description: Settings must be managed via environment variables.

notifications_discord_webhook_id_help: Webhook ID från din Discords webhook URL (funnen efter /webhooks/)
notifications_discord_token_help: Tecken från din Discords webhook URL (den andra delen efter webhook ID)
notifications_discord_username_help: Display name for the notification bot
notifications_discord_avatar_url_help: Avatar image URL for the notification bot
notifications_email_description: Send notifications via email when container updates are detected
notifications_email_from_address_help: Email address to send notifications from
notifications_email_to_addresses_help: Comma-separated list of email addresses to send notifications to
notifications_event_image_update_descrip: Notify when a new image version is available
notifications_event_container_update_des: Notify when a container is actually updated/restarted
notifications_event_vulnerability_found_: Meddela när en skanning hittar en sårbarhet som har en fast version (CVE länk, svårighetsgrad, bild, fast version)
notifications_email_tls_mode_description: StartTLS (default) upgrades from plain connection. SSL/TLS uses encryption from start. None uses no encryption.
notifications_apprise_description: Configure Apprise API for unified notifications across multiple services
notifications_apprise_api_url_help: URL of your Apprise API endpoint
notifications_apprise_image_tag_help: Optional tag for image update notifications
notifications_apprise_container_tag_help: Optional tag for container update notifications
notifications_signal_description: Skicka notifieringar via Signal Messenger via en Signal API-server
notifications_signal_host_help: Värdnamn eller IP-adress för din Signal REST API-server
notifications_signal_host_required: Värd krävs när Signal är aktiverat
notifications_signal_port_help: Portnumret för din Signal REST API-server
notifications_signal_auth_help: Ange antingen Basic Auth (användarnamn + lösenord) ELLER Bärartoken autentisering, inte båda
notifications_signal_auth_required: Antingen Basic Auth (användarnamn + lösenord) eller API-token krävs
notifications_signal_auth_conflict: Kan inte använda både Basic Auth och API Token autentisering
notifications_signal_source_help: Ditt Signal-telefonnummer med landskod (måste börja med +)
notifications_signal_source_required: Källtelefonnummer krävs när Signal är aktiverat
notifications_signal_source_format: Källtelefonnummer måste börja med + och inkludera landskoden
notifications_signal_recipients_help: Kommaseparerad lista med telefonnummer (med +) eller Signalgrupps-ID
notifications_signal_recipients_required: Minst en mottagare krävs när Signal är aktiverad
notifications_signal_disable_tls_descrip: Inaktivera TLS/SSL för Signal REST API-anslutning (rekommenderas inte för produktion)
notifications_slack_description: Skicka notifieringar till Slack kanaler eller direkta meddelanden
notifications_slack_token_required: Token krävs när Slack är aktiverat
notifications_slack_bot_name_help: Visa namn för botten i Slack
notifications_slack_icon_help: Emoji (t.ex., :robot_face:) eller bild-URL för bot avatar
notifications_slack_color_help: Hex färgkod för sidofältet för meddelande
notifications_slack_thread_ts_help: Svara i en tråd (ts-värdet av föräldra-meddelande)
notifications_ntfy_description: Skicka aviseringar via ntfy.sh när behållaruppdateringar upptäcks
notifications_ntfy_host_help: Ntfy server hostname (standard är att ntfy.sh)
notifications_ntfy_port_help: Portnummer för ntfy server (lämna tomt eller 0 för standard)
notifications_ntfy_topic_help: Ämnesnamn för att publicera aviseringar till (krävs, behandla som ett lösenord)
notifications_ntfy_username_help: Användarnamn för autentisering (om det krävs av server)
notifications_ntfy_password_help: Lösenord för autentisering (om det krävs av server)
notifications_ntfy_priority_help: Prioriteringsnivå för aviseringar (Min=1, Low=2, Default=3, High=4, Max/Brådskande =5)
notifications_ntfy_tags_help: Kommaseparerad lista med taggar (kan mappa till emojis på klienter)
notifications_ntfy_cache_help: Tillåt ntfy server att cacha meddelanden (aktiverat som standard)
notifications_ntfy_firebase_help: Skicka notifieringar via Firebase (aktiverat som standard)
notifications_pushover_description: Skicka notifieringar via Pushover när uppdateringar av behållare upptäcks
notifications_pushover_devices_help: Kommaseparerad lista över enhetsnamn. Lämna tomt för att skicka till alla enheter.
notifications_pushover_priority_help: Prioriterad nivå (-2 till 2). Högre värden är mer brådskande.
notifications_gotify_description: Skicka notifieringar via Gotify när uppdateringar av behållare upptäcks
notifications_gotify_port_help: Serverport. Lämna vid 0 för att använda standard (443 för HTTPS, 80 för HTTP)
notifications_gotify_path_help: Valfri underväg om Gotify är installerad i en underkatalog
notifications_gotify_priority_help: Prioriterad nivå (-2 till 10). Högre värden är mer angelägna
notifications_gotify_disable_tls_help: Använd HTTP istället för HTTPS (rekommenderas inte för produktion)
notifications_matrix_description: Skicka notifieringar via Matrix när behållaruppdateringar upptäcks
notifications_matrix_port_help: Serverport. Lämna vid 0 för att använda standard (443 för HTTPS, 80 för HTTP)
notifications_matrix_rooms_help: Ditt Matrix rums-ID (prefixet med '!') eller alias
notifications_matrix_username_help: Användarnamn för autentisering (emtpy när token används)
notifications_matrix_disable_tls_help: Använd HTTP istället för HTTPS (rekommenderas inte för produktion)
notifications_generic_description: Skicka notifieringar till någon webhook-slutpunkt som accepterar HTTP POST-förfrågningar
notifications_generic_webhook_url_help: Den fullständiga webhook endpoint URL inklusive protokoll (http:// eller https://)
notifications_generic_method_help: HTTP-metod att använda för förfrågningar (standard: POST)
notifications_generic_custom_headers_hel: Kommaseparerad lista med anpassade rubriker i formatet 'Nyckel:Value' (t.ex., Auktorisering:Bearer token)
notifications_unsaved_changes_descriptio: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to save them before testing?
first_login_description: For security reasons, you must change the default password before continuing.
first_login_error_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
upgrade_confirm_description: You are about to upgrade Arcane to version {version}.
upgrade_step_pull: Pull the latest Arcane Docker image
upgrade_step_start: Start a new container with the updated image
upgrade_step_preserve: Preserve all your data and settings
upgrade_warning_interruption: This will cause a brief service interruption (~30 seconds)
upgrade_success: Upgrade initiated successfully. Arcane will restart shortly.
upgrade_wait_message: The upgrade is in progress. This may take a few minutes depending on your connection speed.
upgrade_reload_auto: Page will reload automatically in {countdown} seconds
upgrade_remote_description: You are about to upgrade {targetDescription} to v{version}.
upgrade_status_pulling: Downloading new version and preparing to restart...
upgrade_wait_info: This may take 30-60 seconds. The page will reload automatically when ready.
api_key_name_placeholder: Enter a name for this API key
api_key_name_description: A friendly name to identify this API key
api_key_description_help: Additional details about what this API key is used for
api_key_expires_at_description: When this API key will expire. Leave empty for a non-expiring key
api_key_create_description: Create a new API key for programmatic access
api_key_edit_description: Update the details of the API key "{name}"
api_key_created_description: Copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
api_key_important_warning: This is the only time you will see this key. Make sure to copy it and store it securely.
api_key_page_description: Hantera API-nycklar för programmatisk åtkomst till Arcane. Visa API-referens för användningsdetaljer.
api_key_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete the API key "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
api_key_delete_selected_message: Are you sure you want to delete {count} API key(s)? This action cannot be undone.
project_view_description: Switch between classic side-by-side layout and tree view
environments_created_description: Use the API key and deployment snippets below to set up your agent.
environments_api_key_warning: Save this API key securely. It will not be shown again.
environments_create_new_agent_descriptio: Generate an API key and deployment snippets for a new agent.
environments_agent_address_description: The URL where your agent will be accessible
notifications_event_prune_report_descrip: Få en sammanfattande rapport när en schemalagd beskärningsåtgärd slutför
